content: I will ask for experimental loan in which I will buy a share of fund in your behalf, insteed giving you a fast rent: You will get a more profit. If no profit are made but loss: I guarantee to return you money either way with the rent.So I ask for a 100 bucks.You can learn more about fund by following : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2529903I kindly ask for a loan to the address: bc1q9w887748h2slytsepc4le89sf62gnferndua4eOffer highest rents I stil, probably, gonna accept. I have perfect reputation. In my matter loan will be repaidat least with rent agreed and most importantly in time agreed. Thanks you.
